DOC.brief_summary: In this trial the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics and exploratory pharmacodynamics of multiple dose administration of BI 144807 will be investigated in otherwise healthy, controlled asthmatic patients
DOC.brief_title: Multiple Rising Dose Study of BI 144807 Powder in Bottle in Mild Asthmatic Patients
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: 1. mild asthmatic, otherwise healthy subjects (male and female of nonchildbearing potential) Exclusion criteria: 1. Apart from mild asthma any relevant deviation from healthy conditions
